page.title: List of air operations during the Battle of Europe

rev.comment: This image use does not comply with [[WP:NFCC]] #10c and MUST be removed until it does. Thank you.

Line 186: Line 186:
[[File:Roundel of the German Air Force border.svg|12px]] '''January 21''': As revenge for the British raids on Berlin, Germany started the [[Operation Steinbock|Baby Blitz]] (planned since November 27).<ref name=Jones/>{{Rp|396}}

[[File:Pegasusflash.jpg|12px]] 10 February : [[Operation Colossus]], the first British paratrooper raid, blew up an Italian aqueduct.{{Specify|Where in Italy?|date=June 2008}}
+
10 February : [[Operation Colossus]], the first British paratrooper raid, blew up an Italian aqueduct.{{Specify|Where in Italy?|date=June 2008}}
[[File:RAF roundel.svg|12px]] March 31/April 1: A bombing raid on Emden is the first use of the {{convert|4000|lb|abbr=on}} HC "cookie" [[blockbuster bomb]]
